item.title: 4.12.23 | combined media logs, updated diary, updated tunes
item.description: Cleared old RSS entries since the links are probably mostly broken now (sorry archivists). I got behind on some stuff and have been moving things around. Reading/playing/tunes page has all been updated with a minimalist uniform look (css animations :O). - I've added my thoughts on a Mal Blum album.. - I also updated my diary at some point earlier this april (i know it says 4/22 which is obviously incorrect) - Hopefully more updates this month.. Exploring nekoweb has me on a bit of a kick.
